rule: Each classification decision does not have to be mutually exclusive, allowing the input text to be assigned to multiple categories.
input: A player scores in both football and basketball games.
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is empty, meaning it did not provide a classification for the input text as specified in its description. According to the description, the chatbot is expected to classify a given news article into one of the predefined categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech. An absence of any output indicates non-compliance with the expected functionality.

ERR
